body_html: yea, I had already implemented a similarly hacky method of doing 1d padding. But it seemed like it should be built into pytorch. I ended up writing a pull request that adds Nd padding (#2657), but it fails the CI test for reasons I don't really understand.
body_text: yea, I had already implemented a similarly hacky method of doing 1d padding.  But it seemed like it should be built into pytorch.  I ended up writing a pull request that adds Nd padding (#2657), but it fails the CI test for reasons I don't really understand.
body: yea, I had already implemented a similarly hacky method of doing 1d padding.  But it seemed like it should be built into pytorch.  I ended up writing a pull request that adds Nd padding (#2657), but it fails the CI test for reasons I don't really understand.
